titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: Patient Level Information Costing System Data Set - Reconciliation - Overview

div.p: The MandationÂ column indicates the recommendation for the inclusion of data.
M = Mandatory: this data element is mandatory and the technical process (e.g. submission of the data set, production of output etc) cannot be completed without this data element being present

li.p: R = Required: NHS business processes cannot be delivered without this data element

div.p: For guidance on the Data Set constraints, see the PLICS Reconciliation Data Set Constraints.
